Shanghai Museum Map mini program

A mini program which can help users know about the museums of Shanghai better. Shanghai Museum Map mini program has following functions:

1.Users can see all the museums'location of Shanghai in this map.

2.Users can check out the details of museums in this mini program

3.enter the texts user want to add into the image

4.Users can search the museum they want to check

l worked as a front end develop in this project.
